verbs.description: SINGAPORE -- The parents of Otto Warmbier , [ARG1: the American college student] [R-ARG1: who] [V: died] [ARGM-TMP: after being released from a North Korean prison last year] , are thanking President Donald Trump for his kind words about their son .

SINGAPORE -- The parents of Otto Warmbier , the American college student who died after [V: being] released from a North Korean prison last year , are thanking President Donald Trump for his kind words about their son .

SINGAPORE -- The parents of Otto Warmbier , the American college student [ARG1: who] died after being [V: released] [ARG2: from a North Korean prison] [ARGM-TMP: last year] , are thanking President Donald Trump for his kind words about their son .

[ARGM-DIS: SINGAPORE] -- [ARG0: The parents of Otto Warmbier , the American college student who died after being released from a North Korean prison last year ,] are [V: thanking] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: for his kind words about their son] .
